EVTDESC_RIP_4030;My court physician [Physician.GetTitledFirstName] has shared some of [Physician.GetHerHis] latest ideas with me. I do not know much of medicine
column2: but perhaps [Physician.GetSheHe] is on to something. [Physician.GetSheHeCap] has asked for some money to develop [Physician.GetHerHis] theory further and write a book on it.;Mon physicien de la Cour [Physician.GetTitledFirstName] m'a fait part de ses dernières idées. Je ne m'y connais pas en médecine
column3: mais peut-être qu'[Physician.GetSheHe] est sur une piste. [Physician.GetSheHeCap] a demandEde l'argent pour vérifier ses théories et écrire un livre Ece propos.;Mein Arzt [Physician.GetTitledFirstName] berichtete mir von seinen Ideen. Von Medizin verstehe ich nichts
column5: was [Physician.GetSheHe] vorschlägt.
